name: for_loop
description: Iterates over a sequence of values.
use_case: Use to repeat an action for each element in a list, tuple, or other iterable.

name: while_loop
description: Repeats a block of code while a condition is true.
use_case: Use when you want to repeat actions until a condition becomes false.

name: if_statement
description: Executes a block of code if a condition is true.
use_case: Use to branch code execution based on a condition.

name: function_definition
description: Defines a reusable block of code.
use_case: Use to group code into a callable function.

name: list_comprehension
description: Creates a new list by applying an expression to each item in an iterable.
use_case: Use for concise creation of lists from other iterables.

name: import_statement
description: Imports a module or specific objects from a module.
use_case: Use to access external libraries or code.

name: try_except
description: Handles exceptions that may occur in a block of code.
use_case: Use to catch and handle errors gracefully.

name: with_statement
description: Manages resources, such as files, using a context manager.
template:
with open({filename}, 'r') as f:
    data = f.read()
use_case: Use for safe and automatic resource management.

name: class_definition
use_case: Use to create custom data types and objects.

name: print_statement
description: Outputs text or values to the console.
use_case: Use to display information to the user or for debugging.
